turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I was wondering if you have any pizza specials tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This is Pizza King on Macedonia Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would to order 2 18 inch pizzas. 1 Royal feast and 1 Royal feast without mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm so sorry. Our largest pizza is 16 inch.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I see. That is fine then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I add extra cheese to one of those pizza's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, which one would you like the extra cheese on?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the extra cheese on the Royal feast with no mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I add an order of breadsticks to that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have your order as 1 16 inch Royal feast with extra cheese and no mushrooms , 1 16 inch Royal feast and 1 order of breadsticks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would that be pick up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick that up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think I would like to add extra cheese to my other pizza also and could I order 2 large pepsi's also?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. I have your order as 2 large pepsi's, 1 order of breadsticks, 2 16 inch royal feast pizza with extra cheese and no mushrooms on 1 on those. and you will be picking up your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your total comes to $35, How will you be paying?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be using my credit card. About what time will that be ready to pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We will have your order ready for you in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you very much for your order. I will send you a copy of your receipt by text message to your phone number.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
